00035 /* Register Definitions */
00036 #define GPIO_ID_REG       0x00
00037 #define GPIO_SCRATCH      0x04
00038 #define GPIO_LED16SEG     0x08
00039 #define GPIO_DIPSW        0x0a
00040 #define GPIO_CNTRCTRL     0x0c
00041 #define GPIO_CNTRVAL      0x10
00042 #define GPIO_CNTRRELOAD   0x14
00043 #define GPIO_DMAREQ       0x18
00044 #define GPIO_WR_CNTR      0x1c
00045 #define GPIO_RD_CNTR      0x20
00046 
00047 // Interrupt controller is in GPIO block
00048 #define INTRCTL_ID_REG     0x100
00049 #define INTRCTL_CTRL       0x104
00050 #define INTRCTL_STATUS     0x108
00051 #define INTRCTL_ENABLE     0x10c
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 // DownCounter Control Reg Bit Defs
00056 #define CNTR_RUN     1
00057 #define CNTR_RELOAD  2 
00058 #define CNTR_INTR_EN 4    // enable interrupt when coutn reaches 0 (not implemented)
00059 
00060 
00061 // DMA Req/Ack Reg Bit Defs
00062 #define DMA_REQ_WR  1
00063 #define DMA_REQ_RD0 2
00064 #define DMA_REQ_RD1 4
00065 #define DMA_REQ_RD2 8
00066 #define DMA_REQ_RD3 0x10
00067 
00068 #define DMA_ACK_WR  0x0100
00069 #define DMA_ACK_RD0 0x0200
00070 #define DMA_ACK_RD1 0x0400
00071 #define DMA_ACK_RD2 0x0800
00072 #define DMA_ACK_RD3 0x1000
00073 
00074 
00075 // Interrupt Controller Reg Bit Defs
00076 #define INTRCTL_OUT_ACTIVE 0x01
00077 #define INTRCTL_TEST_MODE  0x02
00078 #define INTRCTL_OUTPUT_EN  0x04
00079 #define INTRCTL_INTR_TEST1 0x0100
00080 #define INTRCTL_INTR_TEST2 0x0200
00081 #define INTRCTL_TEST1_EN   0x0001
00082 #define INTRCTL_TEST2_EN   0x0002
00083 #define INTRCTL_DOWN_COUNT_EN          0x0020
00084 #define INTRCTL_INTR_DOWN_COUNT_ZERO   0x0020
00085 
00086 #define INTRCTL_INTR_WR_CHAN 0x0001
00087 #define INTRCTL_INTR_RD_CHAN 0x001e
00088 
00089 
00090 #define OLD_GPIO_ID_VALID    0x53030100
00091 #define GPIO_ID_VALID    0x12043010
00092 #define INTRCTL_ID_VALID 0x12043050
00093
